creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photo-collage of photographic image, abstract form, and text printed in xerography on wove paper covers; 10 pp.

title: LIFEMIT
